Nightlight::

"'cause you're agree to train her to fight?"said Nightlight looking 
to Aerotaur"I know that you like help her... but is that the answer? 
what can she know about war and dangers involved it?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Definitely.  But hurry up.  I'm not sure how much time we have 
before 
> the next assault."  He walks outside the base and stands next to 
Nightlight.  
> He watches Trinity and Zeni playing with Zero for a while before 
looking over 
> to her.  "Are you angry at me?"
